long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for Conga Platform
1) Shows the instance Name based on login
2) Opens and passes user Id to the VSCode extension
3) Copy the token directly by click on instance name
4) Use Extension to query data from platform
5) See all details of record based on object type and record Id
6) Import data for update, insert or deletion from platform
